basic_information.scholarship_name: Citizens Bank of Edmond Endowed Scholarship Fund
basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Citizens Bank of Edmond Endowed Scholarship Fund is open to full-time undergraduate students with a declared College of Business major. Minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA. Eligibility Requirements Declared College of Business major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Full-time Undergraduate student Students should list any group memberships or community activities in their application Selection Process Preference will be given to candidates who are actively involved in community or campus-based activities and/or groups

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
